invite.description: Returns the bot invite link, to invite the bot to other Discord guilds.

prefix.description: Gets and sets the current guild prefix.
prefix.prefix_reset: The prefix has been reset to: `{0}`
prefix.prefix_too_long: The requested prefix is too long!

support.description: Returns a link to the Discord support server.

usage.description: Gets the usage for a command.
usage.title: Usage for command |%|{0}
usage.specify_usage: Please specify command to get usage from!

cat.description: Returns a random picture of a cat.

dog.description: Returns a random picture of a dog.

color.description: Gives information about a provided colour.
color.valid_rgb: RGB values should be between 0 and 255!
color.valid_hex_code: Please provide a valid hex value! #000000-#FFFFFF
color.valid_decimal: Please provide a valid decimal value! 0-16777215
color.valid_binary:
Please enter a valid binary value!
0-111111111111111111111111
color.color_not_recognised: Could not recognise colour from the given value!

random.numbers_only: The range needs to be a integer value!

serverinfo.description: Returns information regarding the specified server.

userinfo.description: Returns information regarding the specified user.

add.description: Adds a permission to a group.
add.fail: Couldn't add permission `{0}` to group `{1}` as they already have the permission

remove.description: Removes a permission from the group.
remove.fail: Couldn't removed permission `{0}` from group `{1}` as they already have the permission

info.description: Gets the information about a group.
info.empty_group: Group has no permissions or roles

link.description: Links a group to a role.

unlink.description: Unlink a role from a group.

move.description: Moves groups around in the hierarchy
move.wrong_mode: Cannot move groups in most restrictive mode

switch.fail: The permission mode {1} isn't a valid permission mode!

add.description: Adds a permission to a user.
add.fail: Couldn't add permission `{0}` to user `{1}` as they already have the permission

remove.description: Removes a permission from a user.
remove.fail: Couldn't remove permission `{0}` from user `{1}` as they don't have the permission

put.description: Adds a group to a user.
put.fail: Couldn't add user `{0}` to group `{1}` because they're already in the group

remove.description: Removes a group from a user.
remove.fail: Couldn't remove user `{0}` from group {1}` because they're not in the group

list.description: Lists the groups or permissions a user has.

test.description: Tests whether a user has a permission or not.

flags.description: Shows what services and extra features this server has access to.

module.description: Interacts with modules by enabling, disabling or listing them.

disable.cannot_find_module: We couldn't find that module. Use `|%|module list` for a list of modules.

enable.cannot_find_module: We couldn't find that module. Use `|%|module list` for a list of modules.

settings.description: Allows users to change settings for the guild.

list.description: Lists the settings that can be changed for the guild.

settings.cannot_edit: You cannot edit this setting! You need the: {0} flag to do this!
settings.setting_set: Setting {0} has been set to a value of {1}.

category.description: Moves a tag to a specific category.

placeholders.header: To use placeholders in tags you wrap the placeholder in `{}` (example: `{server_name}`). If a place holder requires more options (like args) you use this format `{placeholder:option1,option2}` (example: `{args:0}`).

raw.description: Displays a tag's content and category.

ban.description: Bans or forcebans the specified user.
ban.forcefully_ban:
**We couldn't find that user in this guild!** 
 If you would like to forcefully ban them, please react to this message!

softban.description: Bans and then unbans a specified user in order to remove messages and kick the user.

unban.cannot_unban: Could not find a user to unban matching: {0}
unban.several_matches:
There is more than one user that matches this criteria! 
 Please enter the ID or the user's full name!

join.description: Joins the bot to a voice channel.
join.user_not_connected: You are not connected to a voice channel!
join.already_connected: I am already connected to your channel!
join.successfully_joined: I have successfully joined the voice channel `#{0}`

leave.description: Tells the bot to leave a voice channel.
leave.successfully_left: I have successfully left the channel `#{0}`

loop.not_valid_mode: `{0}` is not a valid loop mode! Valid modes are: {0}

pause.already_paused: Music has already been paused! Use **{0}resume** to resume.

play.could_not_find_matches: We could not find music that matches: `{0}`
play.encountered_error: We encountered an error processing that! {0}

load.load_track:
Where would you like to load this track from
|one| User
|two| Guild

save.nothing_to_save: There's nothing to save! The queue for this server is empty.
save.playlist_already_exists: Playlist already exists in guild and you don't have the perm `cascade.queue.dave.overwrite` to overwrite it.
save.playlist_overwrite: Playlist already exists. Would you like to overwrite it?

resume.already_resumed: Music is already playing! Use **{0}pause** to pause it.

search.multiple_results: We found multiple results for this search!
search.search_timed_out: The search for `{0}` has timed out!

no.description: Votes to not skip a track.

cannot_skip.no_music: Can't skip if you aren't listening to music!
cannot_skip.no_vote: Cannot vote if you aren't listening!

skip.added_vote: A skip vote is already running but don't worry! We added your vote automatically!
skip.skipped_user_queued: Skipped currently playing song because you queued it.

stop.not_stopped: Music isn't playing, nothing to stop!

volume.description: Returns or sets the current music player volume.
volume.no_flag: Unfortunately you do not have the flag `Music Services` to run this command! This is a donator feature only |smile|
volume.greater_than_zero: Volume needs to be greater than 0%.
volume.extreme_volume: Are you sure you want to exceed 100% volume?
volume.volume_range: Volume needs to be between 0% and 200%.

other.name: join.other
other.label: Make Cascade join a different channel

moderation_manager.failed_action: Could not {0} the user {1} due to an exception!
moderation_manager.cannot_action_owner: Cannot {0} user {1} as they are the owner of the guild!
moderation_manager.cannot_action_superior: Cannot {0} user {1} the top role they have is higher than mine!

misc.load_options:
|musical_note| - Load as track `{0}`
|notes| - Load as playlist `{1}`
misc.load_options_title: Load as a single track or as a playlist?
misc.cannot_find_tracks: We couldn't find any tracks to load!
misc.loaded_tracks: Loaded `{0}` tracks with a total length of `{1}`

handler.more_than_five: YouTube returned more then 5 results! A check of the YouTube api is recommended

responses.cannot_find_voice_channel: Could not find that voice channel to connect to!
responses.voice_not_connected: I am not connected to a voice channel!
responses.invalid_guild_id: That isn't a valid guild ID!
responses.no_cascade_perm_discord: You don't have the permission `{0}` or the Discord permission(s) {1} that you need to do this!
responses.no_cascade_perm: You don't have the permission `{0}` that you need to do this!
responses.no_discord_perm: You don't have the Discord permission `{0}` that you need to do this!
responses.no_discord_perm_bot: I don't have the Discord permission `{0}` that I need to do this!
responses.incorrect_usage_title_1: That's not the correct usage for the command!
responses.failed_to_process_command: There was an error while processing your command!
responses.failed_to_run_command: There was an error while running the command!
responses.cant_delete_guild_messages: We can't delete guild messages as we won't have the permission manage messages! Please either give me this permission or turn off command message deletion!
responses.module_for_command_disabled: The module `{0}` for command `{1}` is disabled!

messaging.report_error: Please report the stack trace and the error to the developers here: {0}

mentionPrefix.description: Whether the bot will respond to a mention as a prefix.

deleteCommand.description: Whether the original command messages should be deleted after running the command.

useEmbedForMessages.description: Whether to use embedded messages to display information.

showPermErrors.description: Whether to show an error if someone does not have permission to do an action.

showModuleErrors.description: Whether to show an error when trying to run a command from a disabled module.

adminsHaveAllPerms.description: Whether users with the "Administrator" permission are able to run all actions on the bot.

allowTagCommands.nice_name: Allow tags to be used as commands
allowTagCommands.description: Whether tags can be executed using ;<tagname>.

enabledModules.description: The modules whose commands are allowed to be ran on the server.

prefix.description: The prefix for all commands directed at the bot. It is recommended to make sure that this doesn't conflict with other bots.

tags.description: The tags saved on this server.

server.description: Gets information about the current server

member_count.description: Gets the amount of people in this server

sender.description: Gets the user who executed the tag

channel.description: Gets the channel that the tag was ran in

userperms#list#user#permissions.name: permissions
userperms#list#user#permissions.description: Lists the permissions a user has.

userperms#list#user#groups.name: groups
userperms#list#user#groups.description: Lists the groups a user has.

permission_command.no_group_found: No group found with name or id `{0}`!
permission_command.too_many_groups: There are more than 5 groups with the same name! Please use a group ID instead.
